<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">[Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 337 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Renewal](/Lessons.aspx?ID=10)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A field of positive energy fills the area, exuding warmth and rejuvenating those within. Each living creature that starts its turn in the area regains 1d8 Hit Points, and any undead creature that starts its turn in the area takes 1d8 positive damage.

---
**Heightened (8th)** The healing and damage increase to 1d10.

**Heightened (9th)** The healing and damage increase to 1d12.
name: Field of Life
